trans-unit.source: Creates multiple responsibilities in one step.

seg-source.mrk: Creates multiple responsibilities in one step.

target.mrk: 在單一步驟中建立多筆責任。

trans-unit.source: To save time and ensure error-free handling, you can use the <uicontrol>Mass Create</uicontrol> pushbutton to trigger the creation of multiple order fulfillment responsibilities in one step. When doing so, you must specify the split criterion and the default horizon that will be used for all the order fulfillment responsibilities. Furthermore, you can define if the order fulfillment responsibilities are to be valid for sales and/or strock transport orders and which <xref keyref="loio427e9b5e285646e88d50c00c972bad03"/> is to be applied. All values are specified in the <uicontrol>Create Multiple Order Fulfillment Responsibilities</uicontrol> dialog:

seg-source.mrk: To save time and ensure error-free handling, you can use the <uicontrol>Mass Create</uicontrol> pushbutton to trigger the creation of multiple order fulfillment responsibilities in one step.
When doing so, you must specify the split criterion and the default horizon that will be used for all the order fulfillment responsibilities.

Furthermore, you can define if the order fulfillment responsibilities are to be valid for sales and/or strock transport orders and which <xref keyref="loio427e9b5e285646e88d50c00c972bad03"/> is to be applied.
All values are specified in the <uicontrol>Create Multiple Order Fulfillment Responsibilities</uicontrol> dialog:

target.mrk: 若要節省時間並確保零失誤處理，您可以在單一步驟中使用 <uicontrol>[大量建立]</uicontrol> 按鈕，驅動建立多筆訂單執行責任。
如此，您必須指定將用於所有訂單執行責任的分割準則和預設總時程。
不過，您可定義訂單執行責任是否將適用於銷售和/或庫存調撥單，以及待套用的 <xref keyref="loio427e9b5e285646e88d50c00c972bad03"/>。
<uicontrol>[建立多重訂單執行責任]</uicontrol> 對話會指定所有值：

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Split Criterion</uicontrol> is the base characteristic for each of your order fulfillment responsibilities, for example, a specific plant or material group. If you choose plant as your split criterion, the app will create one order fulfillment responsibility for each of the plants at which a material exists in your system.

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>Split Criterion</uicontrol> is the base characteristic for each of your order fulfillment responsibilities, for example, a specific plant or material group.
If you choose plant as your split criterion, the app will create one order fulfillment responsibility for each of the plants at which a material exists in your system.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[分割準則]</uicontrol> 是您每筆訂單執行責任的基礎特性，例如：特定工廠或物料群組。
如果您選擇工廠作為分割準則，應用程式會針對系統中有物料的工廠，建立一筆訂單執行責任。

trans-unit.source: <uicontrol>Default Horizon</uicontrol> is the processing time frame for the order data your order fulfillment specialists see in the <uicontrol>Release for Delivery</uicontrol> app, expressed in days. If you define the default horizon to be two days, the <uicontrol>Release for Delivery</uicontrol> app displays order data for materials with a material availability date within the next two days when an order fulfillment specialist opens a worklist for a specific order fulfillment responsibility.

seg-source.mrk: <uicontrol>Default Horizon</uicontrol> is the processing time frame for the order data your order fulfillment specialists see in the <uicontrol>Release for Delivery</uicontrol> app, expressed in days.

If you define the default horizon to be two days, the <uicontrol>Release for Delivery</uicontrol> app displays order data for materials with a material availability date within the next two days when an order fulfillment specialist opens a worklist for a specific order fulfillment responsibility.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>[預設總時程]</uicontrol> 是 <uicontrol>[核發以用於交貨]</uicontrol> 應用程式中，您的訂單執行專員所看到的訂單資料處理期間，會以天數表示。
如果您將預設總時程定義為兩天，當訂單執行專員開啟特定訂單執行責任的工作清單時，<uicontrol>[核發以用於交貨]</uicontrol> 應用程式會顯示物料的訂單資料，包含兩天內物料可用日期。

trans-unit.source: Note that although you can create multiple order fulfillment responsibilities in one step, you cannot assign multiple order fulfillment responsibilities to multiple order fulfillment specialists in one step: assignments can be made to individual order fulfillment specialists only.

seg-source.mrk: Note that although you can create multiple order fulfillment responsibilities in one step, you cannot assign multiple order fulfillment responsibilities to multiple order fulfillment specialists in one step: assignments can be made to individual order fulfillment specialists only.

target.mrk: 請注意，雖然您可以在單一步驟中建立多筆訂單執行責任，但無法在單一步驟中，將多筆訂單執行責任指派給多位訂單執行專家：僅能指派給個別訂單執行專家。
